modName: Female Body Textures for Dream Girl and SG Face
summary: This is a female texture pack for users, using Petrovich's brand new body type "Dream Girl" and want to use face textures in Hellosanta's "SG" female textures.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow][size=4]Female Body Textures for Dream Girl Body and SG Female Textures Renewal[/size][/color][/b]


[b][color=yellow]Modified and Released by Neovinci aka Meister[/color][/b]


This is a female texture pack for users they using Petrovich's brand new body type "Dream Girl" and want to use face textures in Hellosanta's "SG" female textures.
Actually female textures are not my field, but I customized "SG" textures for my characters and I got request.

Even though this is not perfect like expert modders' texture works, I hope you enjoy your game, "Skyrim", with this texture pack and Petrovich's pretty "DG" body.

Most of this work based on Hellosanta and Petrovich's hard effort. All compliments have to go to Hellosanta and Petrovich.




- Female Body Textures and Hands Textures for DG and SG compatible.

- Face textures are not included. Use Original "SG Female Textures Renewal" ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/? )

- Extract it with 7zip and overwright into your Data folder.
(Before use it, You should installed Dream Girl and SG Female Textures Renewal.)

- It's just first version and it can be changed with following new versions of "Dream Girl".

- Underwear version is not included. Use Original Petrovich's Underwear Textures.





[b][color=yellow][size=3]Requirements before use it[/size][/color][/b]

Petrovich's "Dream Girl" Body : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41443/?

Hellosanta's "SG Female Textures Renewal" : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?

Skyrim






[b][color=yellow][size=3]Uninstallation[/size][/color][/b]

- Open your directory which this texture pack installed. (..SkyrimDataTexturesactorscharacterfemale)

- Delete these 8 files.

femalebody_1.dds
femalebody_1_msn.dds
femalebody_1_s.dds
femalebody_1_sk.dds
femalehands_1.dds
femalehands_1_msn.dds
femalehands_1_s.dds
femalehands_1_sk.dds

- or overwright new female textures you want to use.






[b][color=yellow][size=3]Credit[/size][/color][/b]

For main base of this texture pack,
Hellosanta's SG Female Textures Renewal : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?

For new pretty body and base normal textures,
Petrovich's "Dream Girl" : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41443/?

For nice poses and his works shown example images,
Halofarm : http://mod.dysintropi.me/

As a model of this mod,
My character girl "Amelie Eins"




[b][color=yellow]==========================================================================================================================[/color][/b]

[b][color=yellow]This mod is "Skyrim Nexus" exclusive. Do not redistribute or upload on any other sites without Hellosanta Petrovich and my permission.[/color][/b]

[b][color=yellow]==========================================================================================================================[/color][/b]
author: Meister aka Neovinci
